subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Rangers are one loss away from being ousted, but they faced a 3-2 deficit six times in the past four postseasons, and they overcame it four times.
snippet: The Rangers are one loss away from being ousted, but they faced a 3-2 deficit six times in the past four postseasons, and they overcame it four times.
